Ginger Shallot Soba

Ginger Shallot Soba

Ingredients

  1. 2 Ginger Pieces
  2. 2 Shallots
  3. Soba Noodles
  4. Broth
    1. Garlic
    2. Chicken Broth
  5. Chilli Oil
    1. Chilli Flakes
    2. Paprika
    3. Salt
  6. Olive oil

Instructions

  1. Cut up 2 pieces of ginger and 2 pieces of shallots
    1. Chunks (for broth)
    2. Diced (for topping)
  2. At the same time as making the soba noodles, boil the broth for 10 minutes:
    1. 3 cups of water
    2. 1 satchet of chicken broth
    3. 1 shallot in chunks
    4. 1 piece of ginger in chunks
    5. 1/2 clove of garlic
  3. Make the chilli oil by combining:
    1. 4 tbsp of hot olive oil
    2. 1.5 tsp of chilli flakes
    3. 1 tsp of paprika
    4. 1 tsp of salt
  4. Make the crunch ginger topping by:
    1. Fry 3 tbsp of olive oil with the diced ginger + shallots
    2. Once the ginger is fried add:
      1. 1/4 cup of panko breadcrumbs
      2. 1 tbsp of sesame seeds
      3. 1 tsp of salt
  5. Mix the broth and soba. Add the toppings and chilli oil
